duck: The Quattro Pezzi Sacri or 4 sacred pieces is a compilation of choral works by Verdi.
Anni Sacri (March 12, 1950),is an encyclical of Pope Pius XII issued on the twelfth anniversary of his coronation.
The Sacri Monti of Piedmont and Lombardy are a series of nine groups of chapels and other architectural features in northern Italy.

wiki.text:
'Sacri' may refer to :

*The Sacri Monti of Piedmont and Lombardy are a series of nine groups of chapels
and other architectural features in northern Italy. *Anni Sacri (March 12,
1950),is an encyclical of Pope Pius XII issued on the twelfth anniversary of his
coronation. *The Quattro Pezzi Sacri or 4 sacred pieces is a compilation of
choral works by Verdi.
